content.query:
use oxemarine_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_device
GO
-- create view for device views
CREATE VIEW silver.vw_device
AS
    SELECT DISTINCT
    dev.filepath(1) as device,
    dev.filepath(2) as year,
    dev.filepath(3) as month,
    dev.filepath(4) as day,
    date_key = convert(int, convert(varchar(10), timestamp, 112)) ,
    dev.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/silver/DEVICE/Device=*/year=*/month=*/day=*/*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'oxemarine_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )
    WITH (
        timestamp datetime2(0) ,
--ActualPressure        
        PressureSource float ,
        AtmosphericPressure FLOAT ,
        FuelRailPressure FLOAT ,
--ActuatorCommand
      GearCommand  float , 
      ThrottleCommand float , 
--CogSogRapidUpdate      
      CourseOverGround  float ,
      CourseOverGround_deg float ,   
      SpeedOverGround float ,
      SpeedOverGround_kn float ,
--EngineParametersDynamic   
      EngineInstance int,
      EngineOilPressure float ,
      EngineOilTemp float ,
      EngineCoolantTemp float ,
      BatteryVoltage float ,
      FuelRate float ,
      TotalEngineHours FLOAT ,
      EngineLoad FLOAT ,  
    
--EngineParametersRapid
      EngineSpeed float ,
      BoostPressure float ,
      PttTrim float ,
--OxeProprietary1 
      ActualClutchSlip float ,
      ControlheadPosition float ,
      PropellerSpeed float ,
      RequestClutchSlip float ,
--OxeProprietary4
      GpcState float ,
      GpcDuty float ,
      GpcModuleFaults float ,
--PcmFeedback
      PortCylinderPosition float ,   
      StbdCylinderPosition float , 
--PositionRapidUpdate
      Latitude float ,
      Longitude float ,
--ProductInformation     
      EngineModel varchar(100) ,
      EngineSwVersion varchar(100) ,
      EngineFwVersion varchar(100) ,
      EngineSerialnumber varchar(100) ,
--TemperatureExtendedRange
      TemperatureSource float ,
      EngineRoomTemp FLOAT ,
      ExhaustGasTemp FLOAT ,
	IntakeManifoldTemp FLOAT ,
      FuelTemp FLOAT ,
	EcuTemp FLOAT ,
      CompressorOutTemp FLOAT ,
--TransmissionParametersDynamic
      GearboxOilPressure float ,
      GearboxGear float ,
      GearboxOilTemp float ,
--TripParametersEngine    
      FuelUsed float ,
      FuelRateAverage float 
    
    ) AS [dev]
GO

select * from silver.vw_device
where device='D994BF29' and year=2023 and month=09 and day=30

order by timestamp

select  * from silver.vw_device
where device='4CC52878' and year=2023 and month=04 and day=22
order by timestamp, EngineInstance

select date_key, day, EngineInstance, Rows=count(1)
from silver.vw_device
where device='D994BF29' and year=2023 and month=02 and day>=16
group by date_key, day, EngineInstance
order by 1,2,3

select * from silver.vw_FuelRate
order by timestamp


select * from silver.vw_device
where device='D994BF29' and year=2023 and month=02 and day=16
and timestamp > '2023-02-16T20:19:00.0000000'
order by timestamp

select date_key,EngineInstance, EngineModel, EngineSwVersion, EngineFwVersion, EngineSerialnumber,  count(1) from silver.vw_device
group by date_key,EngineInstance, EngineModel, EngineSwVersion, EngineFwVersion, EngineSerialnumber
order by date_key, EngineInstance, EngineModel
